channel.title: git on tsujimitsu.tsuji.dev
channel.description: Recent content in git on tsujimitsu.tsuji.dev

item.title: git
item.description: git git-flow before coding $ git checkout develop $ git pull origin develop --rebase $ git checkout -b issue-XXX before push(squash) $ git commit -m 'some comment #<issue number>' $ git log $ git rebase -i HEAD~2 before push(rebase) $ git status(gs) $ git pull origin develop --rebase <Fix merge conflict> $ git add . $ git rebase --continue $ git push origin issue-XXX after push(merged to develop)
